ObjectClass.Name: Dome
ObjectClass.Description:
DOME: Robust defensive weapon emplacement Devastating versus air Fires in four-shot bursts
Detects cloaked units Upgradable (Beam Cannon; Weapons Tech)

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target \Fire rate upgradable (Weapons tech)\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 120 (+60), R 24\Air: 160 (+20), R 24

Objective.Name: Upgrade Beam
Objective.Details: Enable long-range Beam Cannon\Replaces weapons, Permanent Anti-Grav\ \Designate targets to engage beyond vision \Slow, low strength, long range fire support

ObjectClass.Name: Beam Dome
ObjectClass.Description:
BEAM DOME: Anti-grav long-range beam platform Slow, vulnerable floating emplacement Effective indirect fire, siege support
Can fire on designated LR targets

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 0.50 (aircraft)\Vision Radius: 22, Aggro Range: 27

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack target or Attack-Move to location \Designate targets to engage beyond vision\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 50, R 100, SR 3 \Air: 50, R 100, SR 3

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: Set an Arcticus as commander or set\target's Arcticus as own commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Heirarchy
Objective.Details: Remove from command hierarchy\ \Disconnect from commander

Objective.Name: Lead group
Objective.Details: \Take lead of everyone that\reports to this unit's Arcticus

ObjectClass.Name: Beam Dome
ObjectClass.Description:
BEAM DOME: Robust long-range beam gun emplacement Strong vs slow, far-away targets
Breaks TSS (TSS: Temporal Soliton Shield) Detects cloaked units

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target \Fire rate upgradable (Weapons tech)\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\Gnd: 32 (+17), R 26\Air: 41 (+8), R 26

Objective.Name: Fire Charge Beam
Objective.Details: Charge and fire Beam Cannon\ at a specific target\Range: 100; Requires line-of-sight\ Damage: 90; Recharge Time: 18 s\ Avg Damage/10secs: 50
